tool.name: prettyplot
tool.description: Displays aligned sequences, with colouring and boxing

param.name: residuesperline
param.label: The number of residues to be displayed on each line

param.name: ccolours
param.label: Colour residues by their consensus value

param.name: docolour
param.label: Colour residues by table oily, amide etc.

param.name: pair
param.label: Values to represent identical similar related

param.name: identity
param.label: Only match those which are identical in all sequences

param.name: boxcol
param.label: Colour the background in the boxes

param.name: boxcolval
param.label: Colour to be used for background

param.name: maxnamelen
param.label: Margin size for the sequence name

param.name: listoptions
param.label: Display the date and options used

param.name: alternative
param.label: Use alternative collisions routine
param.option: Checks identical scores with the max score found. So if any other residue matches the identical score then a collision has occurred
If another residue has a greater than or equal to matching score and these do not match then a collision has occurred
Checks all those not in the current consensus.If any of these give a top score for matching or identical scores then a collision has occured
